cloud_project.title: Nest: Create and configure Cloud Project
cloud_project.description:
The Nest integration allows you to integrate your Nest Thermostats, Cameras, and Doorbells using the Smart Device Management API. The SDM API **requires a time US $5** one time setup fee. See documentation for [more info]({more_info_url}).

1. Go to the [Google Cloud Console]({cloud_console_url}).
1. If this is your first project, click **Create Project** then **New Project**.
1. Give your Cloud Project a Name and then click **Create**.
 1. Enter the Cloud Project ID below e.g. *example-project-12345*.
1. Go to API Library for [Smart Device Management API]({sdm_api_url}) and click **Enable**.
1. Go to API Library for [Cloud Pub/Sub API]({pubsub_api_url}) and click **Enable**.

oauth_input.title: Nest: Configure OAuth
oauth_input.description:
Configure the OAuth Consent Screen to give Home Assistance access to your Cloud Project:
1. Go to the [OAuth consent screen]({oauth_consent_url})
1. Configure the consent screen following the [instructions]({more_info_url}).

You also need to create OAuth credentials that will be linked with your Nest Devices.
1. Navigate to the [Credentials]({oauth_creds_url}) page and click **Create Credentials**.
1. From the drop-down list select **OAuth client ID**.
1. Enter **Desktop App** for the Application Type.
1. Pick a name for your credential.

Enter your OAuth credentials below.

device_project.title: Nest: Create a Device Access Project
device_project.description:
Create a Nest Device Access project which **requires a US$5 fee** to set up.
1. Go to the [Device Access Console]({device_access_console_url}), and through the payment flow.
1. Click on **Create project**
1. Give your Device Access project a name and click **Next**.
1. Enter your OAuth Client ID created in the last step:
> {oauth_client_id}
1. Enable events by clicking **Enable** and **Create project**.

Enter your Device Access Project ID below ([more info]({more_info_url})).
